title: Ep 17: Talking Natural Beauty with Jessa Blades
itunes:title: Ep 17: Talking Natural Beauty with Jessa Blades
itunes:subtitle: In this week's episode, Kate and Doree discuss their struggles with staying organized, and break down what they're doing to master their to do lists. Then, they speak to makeup artist and natural beauty expert Jessa Blades. ...
description:
In this week's episode, Kate and Doree discuss their struggles with staying organized, and break down what they're doing to master their to do lists. Then, they speak to makeup artist and natural beauty expert Jessa Blades. She delves into the role food plays in skincare, the best brands for natural beauty, and even gives a simple face mask recipe you can whip up in your kitchen. Find her on Instagram at @jessablades and get 15% off any purchase at JessaBlades.com when you use the promo code: Forever35.

Plus: we're running a survey that will help guide upcoming content and guests! Please fill it out at forever35podcast.com/survey.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • Thrive Market -- Visit ThriveMarket.com/Forever35 for $60 worth of free organic groceries with free shipping.
  • Away -- Visit AwayTravel.com/Forever35 (or use Forever35 at checkout) for $20 off an incredible, phone charging suitcase.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
